|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **1. Use a .env file**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | VS Code's Python extension uses the `python-dotenv` package to automatically read and load environment variables from a file named `.env` in your workspace, if one exists.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Here's how to do it:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 1. In the root directory of your workspace, create a new file named `.env`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 2. Open the `.env` file and enter your environment variables, one per line, like this:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     DB_HOST=your_database_host                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     DB_NAME=your_database_name                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     DB_USER=your_username                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     DB_PASS=your_password                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 3. Save the `.env` file. The Python extension for VS Code will automatically load these variables when you run your Python script.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | **2. Use VS Code's launch.json file**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | You can also set environment variables in the `launch.json` file, which is used to configure VS Code's debugger.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Here's how:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 1. Click on the "Run" icon in the Activity Bar on the side of VS Code.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 2. Click on "create a launch.json file" link.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 3. In the `launch.json` file, you can add an `env` key in the configuration. This key is an object where each property is a string representing an environment variable and its value:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     ```json                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |         "version": "0.2.0",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |         "configurations": [                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |             {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "name": "Python: Current File",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "type": "python",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "request": "launch",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "program": "${file}",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "console": "integratedTerminal",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 "env": {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                     "DB_HOST": "your_database_host",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                     "DB_NAME": "your_database_name",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                     "DB_USER": "your_username",                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                     "DB_PASS": "your_password"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |         ]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |     ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 4. Save the `launch.json` file. The environment variables you've added will be available whenever you run your script using the selected configuration.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Remember to replace `your_database_host`, `your_database_name`, `your_username`, `your_password` with your actual values in both methods. And do not commit your `.env` file or `launch.json` file containing sensitive information (like passwords) into version control. You might want to add `.env` to your `.gitignore` file to ensure it doesn't get committed.                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |

Begin by setting up an account, then look into running basic queries and tasks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |

|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 5. **Databricks with Python and PySpark**: You should learn how to use Python and PySpark within the Databricks environment. You’ll learn how to ingest data, perform transformations, and output the results.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |    - Resources: [Databricks PySpark Documentation](https://docs.databricks.com/spark/latest/spark-sql/index.html)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 6. **Working with Delta Tables in Databricks**: Delta Lake is a technology developed by Databricks to improve the reliability and performance of data lakes. Learn about creating and maintaining delta tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |    - Resources: [Delta Lake Quickstart](https://docs.databricks.com/delta/delta-intro.html)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 7. **Incremental Loading in Databricks**: Understand how to create a data pipeline that incrementally loads data into your delta tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |    - Resources: [Databricks Knowledge Base](https://kb.databricks.com/data/incremental-data-pipeline.html)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 8. **Advanced Spark and Databricks topics**: Now that you have a strong foundation, you can look at more advanced topics such as optimizing performance, more complex data engineering tasks, MLlib for machine learning, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |    - Resources: [Advanced Analytics with Spark](https://www.amazon.com/Advanced-Analytics-Spark-Patterns-Learning/dp/1491972955), [Databricks Blogs](https://databricks.com/blog)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | 9. **Best Practices with Notebooks and Spark SQL**: In the end, learn how to effectively use notebooks for data science and engineering, and leverage Spark SQL for your data queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |    - Resources: [Databricks Notebook Guide](https://docs.databricks.com/notebooks/index.html), [Spark SQL Guide](https://spark.apache.org/sql/)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|     |                                      |               |               | Remember to start slow, practice a lot, and build things as you learn. This will solidify your understanding and give you practical experience. Databricks also offers its own training and certifications, so you might want to look into that as well. Good luck on your learning journey!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
